name: process-sass-files
description: Compile sass files to css and add vendor prefixes
author: Nithin.bc

inputs.name: inputFile
inputs.label: Full path of the sass file
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can use pipeline variables in here. For example: **$(Build.SourcesDirectory)\content\styles	heme.scss**

inputs.name: outputFile
inputs.label: Full path of the css file to be generated
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can use pipeline variables in here. For example: **$(Build.SourcesDirectory)\content\styles\theme.css**

inputs.name: style
inputs.label: How do you want the compiled css to be?

inputs.name: enableVendorPrefixing
inputs.label: Add vendor prefixes
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked vendor prefixes will be added to the compiled css

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: The working directory where dart-sass is installed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Leave this field in case dart-sass in available from **path** variable
